fields.name: __***Summary***__
fields.value:
1 - Global commands
2 - Lg commands
3 - Jdr-zeub commands

fields.name: Bot description
fields.value:
This bot was crated for fun, he's oriented rpg especialy lg.

Replace [...] by following instruction, dont write [] but respect contained syntax.

fields.name: Comands list
fields.value:
- {%}help >> Display bot help tool.
- {%}ping >> Ping request for test bot.
- {%}[n]d[x] >> Roll n in range [1,x].

fields.name: __***Intro***__
fields.value:
Every lg commands use "{%}{lg}" as prefix.
- Replace [...] by the contained instruction, [argument ...] mean you can use this command with multiple arguments.
- Be carreful, respecte spaces and quoting, \ mean this command can work without argument.

fields.name: __***Game Commands***__
fields.value:
- start[\n] >> Lunch the game with n cards (1 without n).
- end >> End current game.
- vote >> Show vote options.
- kill [@player] >> Substract 1 to mentionned player hp counter

fields.name: __***Player Commands***__
fields.value:
- padd [@player ...] >> Add to current player list following players.
- pset [@player ...] >> Erease current list and replace it by following players.
- plist >> Bot send in this channel players list.
- pclear >> Reset current players list.
- patt[n] >> Attribute role, without start game, and send to each players his own one.
- plifeset[n] >> Set all players life to n.

fields.name: __***Cards Commands***__
fields.value:
- cclear[n] >> Reset nth cards list.
- cset[n] ["card name", ...] >> Set nth cards list with following cards.
- cadd[n] ["card name", ...] >> Add to nth cards list following cards.

fields.name: Intro
fields.value: Every role comands use {%}r as prefix.

fields.name: Comands list
fields.value:
- list >> Send in this channel the role list of the serveur.
- send [$Role$ ...] message >> send the each role owner the message specified.

fields.name: Intro
fields.value: Every jdr-zeub comands use {%}{z} as prefix.

fields.name: Comands list
fields.value:
- charlist >> Send in this chanel every characteres list.
- charsheet[n] >> Send in this channel specified character sheet (charlist to know index [n])
